document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R21-016
Adopting the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Conflict of Interest Policy
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 28th day of July, 2021, the following law was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo") has received a grant for infrastructure improvement from the U.S. Department of Agriculture â€“ Rural Development ("USDA-RD"); and,
the USDA-RD requires that the Pueblo have a conflict of interest policy in place relating to planned or potential transactions with the Pueblo; and,
the Pueblo has some provisions relating to conflicts of interest in the Accounting Policies and Procedures Manual but the Pueblo should have a more comprehensive policy; and,

the Council reviewed and considered the attached "Pueblo de San Ildefonso Conflict of Interest Policy" ("Conflict of Interest Policy") and has determined it is in the best interests of the Pueblo to adopt a comprehensive conflict of interest policy.
that the Council hereby enacts the attached law entitled
"ADOPTING THE PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO CONFLICT OF INTERST POLICY ACT."

annotation.doc: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R21-016

attachment.heading: ADOPTING THE PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "ADOPTING THE PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ACT."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this Act is adopt a conflicts of interest policy for the Pueblo relating to planned or potential transactions with the Pueblo.

para.text: "Act" means "Adopting the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Conflict of Interest Policy Act.
"Conflict of Interest Policy" means the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Conflict of Interest Policy. Also "Policy."
"Pueblo" means the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
"USDA-RD" means the United States Department of Agriculture â€“ Rural Development.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo") has received a grant for infrastructure improvement from the USDA-RD; and
The USDA-RD requires that the Pueblo have a conflict of interest policy in place relating to planned or potential transactions with the Pueblo as part of the grant requirements; and
The Pueblo has some provisions relating to conflicts of interest in the Accounting Policies and Procedures Manual but the Pueblo should have a more comprehensive policy; and

The Council reviewed and considered the attached "Pueblo de San Ildefonso Conflict of Interest Policy and has determined it is in the best interests of the Pueblo to adopt a comprehensive conflict of interest policy.
The Council hereby adopts the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Conflict of Interest Policy.
The Governor is authorized to make any non-substantive changes to the Addendum as may be needed, provided that the Council is notified of such changes.
